turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I have guests in town, and they're hungry, so I think I want to order them some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'm going to probably need two mediums.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first one I'm going to do Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the second one, I'm going to do Margherita pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! would you like to add basil to that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have thick crust for both of those too, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then on the Hawaiian can we also add mushroom?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, i got 2 medium Pizza, one Hawaiian with MushroomÂ  and the 2nd one margarita with basil.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you get thick crust for both?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: my apologies, I forgot to mention the thick crust, yes with thick crust on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me one moment to check.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total for those two medium pizzas will be $28.21.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna and see what their queue time is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright! your pizzas are in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nice. And can you tell me how much those were one more time, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Thank you for your help.
